summary: Expanded Vanilla Dungeons(alpha) is an ever-growing mod that adds lore friendly dungeons to locations in Skyrim that deserve them. This is a mod for people looking to freshen up their playthroughs and add new areas to explore. By subscribing to this mod you will get continuously updated dungeons and new ones added as soon as they are finished.
descriptionHtml:
Status Update:
Things are going slow, but progress is being made. I'm a little bit (read a lot) stuck on the current direction of one of the dungeons, just not sure where to go with it and the actual "designing" of layouts is not my strong suit. I am also a full time student with a part time job as a computer science tutor so my time is pretty strained. Again, thank you all for your support and patience. Rome was not built in a day and I don't plan to rush this.

Description:
Expanded Vanilla Dungeons(alpha) is an ever-growing mod that adds lore friendly dungeons to locations in Skyrim that deserve them. This is a mod for people looking to freshen up their playthroughs and add new areas to explore. By subscribing to this mod you will get continuously updated dungeons and new ones added as soon as they are finished.

Work in Progress:
Ivarstead Pass
More Dungeons
Dungeon related quests
Expanded/Altered Main quest dungeons

Known Bugs:
None that I am aware of.

Patch Notes:
Ver. 0.002A
Fixed bug where NPCS could not enter or leave Riverwood Outpost
Fixed torch light bug in Riverwood Outpost

Ver. 0.001A
Added Riverwood Outpost located at Bleak Falls Tower
author: Dangerpaws
